body:
Day 11 - Manga 255*
The art was unrefined and exaggerated. While the art wasn't the worst, it still was far from something that I would want to see when appreciating something like this. That anf the translation made this almost unbearable, the SFX were too much which made their job harder and some of them were totally unnecessary. Also, some parts of the dialogue made it hard to understand the story and, together with the font, it was extremely taxing for my eyes. The story, while not bad, seemed kinda bland and forced, from what I understand, the guy was a pedophile and, the reaction from the girl mafe it seem like he just liked shaved pussy.
Overhaul, while not bad, the story was bland, the art was basic and the translation was kinda bad.
4/10.
Funny but idk it feels kinda incomplete or something 5/10
Ehh generic art but funny story 6/10
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. I’m sorry y’all
nice and comedic translation seems  a little half baked but still good.
